A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some character motives did not match with the characters we knew to grow and love. It’s out of character for them. It misses the magic that the prior films had. They could have cut one long scene from the movie completely because it was useless to the plot & focus on other scenes that needed more time. Disappointed. Critic reviews being so high shows how $$ plays a large part in all this. So sad..
